DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Modeling Putty/Wax (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Modeling Putty/Wax is widely popular in stage makeup and entertainment industry for adding 3D effects to character makeup. Ideal for building up facial features or creating fake wounds. It is flexible and easy to use for creating fine details. Mehron Modeling Wax's pliability and professional finish makes it a preferred brand among special effects artists, drama students and teachers. Mehron Modeling Wax can be applied using Mehron's Fixative "A" or spirit gum. Comes in 1 ounce container. Watch this video on how to use Mehron Modeling Putty/Wax:
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Flexible and easy to use for 3D makeup
Preferred brand by stage artists, entertainment professionals, drama teachers and students
Easily moldable to create fine details
